title.en: "Souzou Mahou" wo Oboete, Bannou de Saikyou ni Narimashita. Class Kara Tsuihou Shita Yatsura wa, Sokora Hen no Kusa Demo Kuttero!

altTitles.ja: 【創造魔法】を覚えて、万能で最強になりました。クラスから追放した奴らは、そこらへんの草でも食ってろ！

altTitles.en: I Learned [Creation Magic] and Became the Most Versatile and Strongest. Those Who Expelled Me from Class, Go Eat Some Grass Around There!

altTitles.es-la: Aprendí [Magia de Creación], Me Convertí en Todopoderoso y el Más Fuerte.

description.en: It has been three months since the students of the second A class of Nanaike High School were transported to another world. Yuki Mizusawa is accused of being useless by his classmates because of his injured leg, and is the only one expelled from school. While walking in the forest, Yuki accidentally obtains the [creation magic] created by the now deceased hero Akoron. This is an extraordinary power that can materialize everything from superpowered spells to hamburgers. With his former classmates clinging to their old school building, plagued by terrible thoughts and dangerous monsters, Yuki is determined to survive in this other world.
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de instituto, Mizusawa Yuuki, es transportado de repente a otro mundo con toda su clase. Lucha desesperadamente por sobrevivir en un mundo alienígena en el que no conoce nada, Es expulsado injustificadamente de su clase por una lesión en la pierna. ...... Yuuki vaga sin rumbo por el bosque, pero tiene un inesperado encuentro con un misterioso muñeco, Este le enseña la todopoderosa y poderosísima [Magia de Creación]. Pero a cambio, le da la gran tarea de derrotar al rey demonio Zordes, que reina sobre este mundo.
